page.title: 10NEW SHOPPING PRECINCT
page.content: Swan walk is our local shopping precinct. We interviewed some people there. Most people shop for food at Tescos and thought there was a good variety of shops in the centre. However, many thought it difficult to use pushchairs because many shops are too small. Marks and Spencer is a new store in the precinct. Ms Sandra Merlin, the assistant staff manageress said it took 18 months to build. The site previously housed the local theatre and there was much argument about what should be in the precinct. Marks and Spencer donated money towards a new Arts Centre, which we now have. Before coming to the town the company researched the type of shop people in the Horsham area wanted. The store created 120 jobs.
